name: White Dragon Wyrmling
movement: 30 ft. walk, 15 ft. burrow, 60 ft. fly, 30 ft. swim
description: The White Dragon Wyrmling is a Medium-sized dragon distinguished by its icy abilities and formidable presence. Its scales are white like snow, making it blend into cold environments.
memorable: Its Cold Breath ability allows it to unleash a devastating icy blast, making it a significant threat to unprepared adventurers.
goals: To dominate cold environments and prey upon weaker creatures.
relations: Associated with other chromatic dragons and likely to be found with minions or other wyrmlings.
environment: Typically found in icy, snowy terrains or cold climates.
strengths: Immunity to cold damage, effective mobility over icy surfaces.
weaknesses: Low intelligence, making it less effective in strategic planning.
attacks: Bite attack that delivers piercing and cold damage, and a powerful Cold Breath for area damage.
most_powerful_ability: Cold Breath allows the dragon to exhale a chilling blast that can damage multiple enemies.
senses: Blindsight up to 10 feet, allowing it to sense nearby creatures in complete darkness.
skills: Proficient in Perception and Stealth, enhancing its effectiveness in ambushes.
additional_information: Can move across icy surfaces without hindrance due to Ice Walk ability.
Cold Mastery enhances its mobility in snowy environments.
Has the ability to knock targets prone with Pounce attack.
Multiattack allows it to strike effectively with both bite and claw.
Higher than average Constitution makes it resilient in combat.
